top_comments.comment: I keep on asking myself what i would have done in this world without you. Thank you so much for the help.

comments_since_last_sample.body: This is bullshit….Indian farmers pay ZERO income tax on agricultural income  and they get fertiliser at  highly subsidised rates , almost free, subsidised by other taxpayers , playing victim comes naturally to fat cat farmers

FYI, carmadamom is drenched in pesticides. Very toxic, Indian universities dont have any incentive  or doesnt have any interest in developing better strains, Labor is not cheap, its just like any thing in India the huge profit is taken by the middle men. This is the way of life for thousands of years.,may change in 500 years.
People are making crores of profit
They are cheap in Oriental markets in Northern California and Northern Virginia

Farmer:  We make no money
Also farmer:  we must pull money out of our pockets to pay for laborers.

I wish I had magically appearing money like these guys.

الدلة اللي ما تبهر من الهيل
مثل العجوز اللي خبيث نسمها
I keep on asking myself what i would have done in this world without you. Thank you so much for the help.
Bollocks, 99p for a 200g in a my local asian shop
